mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sport.volleyball_data(GAME_ID, LEAGUE, GROUND, MATCH_DATE, DAY_OF_WEEK, MATCH_TIME, A_TEAM_REST_DAY, A_TEAM, B_TEAM, B_TEAM_REST_DAY) VALUES ( #{gameId}, #{league}, #{ground}, #{date}, #{dayOfWeek}, #{time}, IFNULL((SELECT DATEDIFF(#{date} ,(SELECT MATCH_DATE FROM sport.volleyball_data A WHERE A_TEAM = #{aTeam} AND MATCH_DATE < IFNULL(#{date},'') ORDER BY idx DESC LIMIT 1))) -1,0), #{aTeam}, #{bTeam}, IFNULL((SELECT DATEDIFF(#{date} ,(SELECT MATCH_DATE FROM sport.volleyball_data B WHERE B_TEAM = #{bTeam} AND MATCH_DATE < IFNULL(#{date},'')ORDER BY idx DESC LIMIT 1))) -1,0) )
mapper.update:
UPDATE sport.volleyball_data SET A_TEAM_SET_POINT = IFNULL(#{aTeamSetScore},0) , A_TEAM_TOTAL_POINT = IFNULL(#{aTeamTotalPoint},0) , B_TEAM_TOTAL_POINT = IFNULL(#{bTeamTotalPoint},0) , B_TEAM_SET_POINT = IFNULL(#{bTeamSetScore},0) , ODD = IFNULL(#{odd},'') , HANDI_CAP = IFNULL(#{handiCap},0) , HANDI_CAP_RESULT = IFNULL(#{handiCapResult},'') , SET_HANDI_CAP = IFNULL(#{setHandiCap},0) , SET_HANDI_CAP_RESULT = IFNULL(#{setHandiCapResult},'') , POINT_LINE = IFNULL(#{pointLine},0) , POINT_LINE_RESULT = IFNULL(#{pointLineResult},0) ,
A_TEAM_FIRSTQ_POINT = IFNULL(#{aTeamFirstQPoint},0) , B_TEAM_FIRSTQ_POINT = IFNULL(#{bTeamFirstQPoint},0) , FIRSTQ_RESULT = IFNULL(#{firstQResult},''), FIRSTQ_HANDI_CAP = IFNULL(#{firstQHandiCap},0) , FIRSTQ_HANDI_CAP_RESULT = IFNULL(#{firstQHandiCapResult},'') , FIRSTQ_POINT_LINE = IFNULL(#{firstQPointLine},0) , FIRSTQ_POINT_LINE_RESULT = IFNULL(#{firstQPointLineResult},'') ,
A_TEAM_SECONDQ_POINT = IFNULL(#{aTeamSecondQPoint},0), B_TEAM_SECONDQ_POINT = IFNULL(#{bTeamSecondQPoint},0), SECONDQ_RESULT = IFNULL(#{secondQResult},''), SECONDQ_HANDI_CAP_RESULT = IFNULL(#{secondQHandiCapResult},''), SECONDQ_POINT_LINE_RESULT = IFNULL(#{secondQPointLineResult},''),
A_TEAM_THIRDQ_POINT = IFNULL(#{aTeamThirdQPoint},0), B_TEAM_THIRDQ_POINT = IFNULL(#{bTeamThirdQPoint},0), THIRDQ_RESULT = IFNULL(#{thirdQResult},''), THIRDQ_HANDI_CAP_RESULT = IFNULL(#{thirdQHandiCapResult},''), THIRDQ_POINT_LINE_RESULT = IFNULL(#{thirdQPointLineResult},''),
A_TEAM_FOURTHQ_POINT = IFNULL(#{aTeamFourthQPoint},0), B_TEAM_FOURTHQ_POINT = IFNULL(#{bTeamFourthQPoint},0), FOURTHQ_RESULT = IFNULL(#{fourthQResult},''), FOURTHQ_HANDI_CAP_RESULT = IFNULL(#{fourthQHandiCapResult},''), FOURTHQ_POINT_LINE_RESULT = IFNULL(#{fourthQPointLineResult},''),
A_TEAM_FIFTHQ_POINT = IFNULL(#{aTeamFifthQPoint},0), B_TEAM_FIFTHQ_POINT = IFNULL(#{bTeamFifthQPoint},0), FIFTHQ_RESULT = IFNULL(#{fifthQResult},''), FIFTHQ_HANDI_CAP_RESULT = IFNULL(#{fifthQHandiCapResult},''),
FIRST_POINT = IFNULL(#{firstPoint},0) , FIRST_BLOCK = IFNULL(#{firstBlock},0) , FIRST_SERVE = IFNULL(#{firstServe},0) , FIRST_5POINT = IFNULL(#{first5Point},0) , FIRST_7POINT = IFNULL(#{first7Point},0) , FIRST_10POINT = IFNULL(#{first10Point},0) , FIRSTQ_POINT = IFNULL(#{firstQPoint},0) , SECONDQ_POINT = IFNULL(#{secondQPoint},0) , THIRDQ_POINT = IFNULL(#{thirdQPoint},0) , FOURTHQ_POINT = IFNULL(#{fourthQPoint},0) , FIFTHDQ_POINT = IFNULL(#{fifthQPoint},0) , FIRSTQ_TOTAL_POINT = IFNULL(#{firstQTotalPoint},0) , SECONDQ_TOTAL_POINT = IFNULL(#{secondQTotalPoint},0) , THIRDQ_TOTAL_POINT = IFNULL(#{thirdQTotalPoint},0) , FOURTHQ_TOTAL_POINT = IFNULL(#{fourthQTotalPoint},0) , FIFTHDQ_TOTAL_POINT = IFNULL(#{fifthQTotalPoint},0) WHERE GAME_ID = IFNULL(#{gameId},'') AND LEAGUE = IFNULL(#{league},'') AND GROUND = IFNULL(#{ground},'') AND MATCH_DATE = IFNULL(#{date},'') AND A_TEAM = IFNULL(#{aTeam},'') AND B_TEAM = IFNULL(#{bTeam},'') ;
mapper.select: SELECT LEAGUE, GROUND, MATCH_DATE, DAY_OF_WEEK, MATCH_TIME, A_TEAM_REST_DAY, A_TEAM, A_TEAM_SET_POINT, A_TEAM_TOTAL_POINT, B_TEAM_TOTAL_POINT, B_TEAM_SET_POINT, B_TEAM, B_TEAM_REST_DAY, HANDI_CAP, HANDI_CAP_RESULT, ODD, SET_HANDI_CAP, SET_HANDI_CAP_RESULT, POINT_LINE, POINT_LINE_RESULT, A_TEAM_FIRSTQ_POINT, B_TEAM_FIRSTQ_POINT, FIRSTQ_RESULT, FIRSTQ_HANDI_CAP, FIRSTQ_HANDI_CAP_RESULT, FIRSTQ_POINT_LINE, FIRSTQ_POINT_LINE_RESULT, A_TEAM_SECONDQ_POINT, B_TEAM_SECONDQ_POINT, SECONDQ_RESULT, SECONDQ_HANDI_CAP_RESULT, SECONDQ_POINT_LINE_RESULT, A_TEAM_THIRDQ_POINT, B_TEAM_THIRDQ_POINT, THIRDQ_RESULT, THIRDQ_HANDI_CAP_RESULT, THIRDQ_POINT_LINE_RESULT, A_TEAM_FOURTHQ_POINT, B_TEAM_FOURTHQ_POINT, FOURTHQ_RESULT, FOURTHQ_HANDI_CAP_RESULT, FOURTHQ_POINT_LINE_RESULT, A_TEAM_FIFTHQ_POINT, B_TEAM_FIFTHQ_POINT, FIFTHQ_RESULT, FIFTHQ_HANDI_CAP_RESULT, FIRST_POINT, FIRST_BLOCK, FIRST_SERVE, FIRST_5POINT, FIRST_7POINT, FIRST_10POINT, FIRSTQ_POINT, SECONDQ_POINT, THIRDQ_POINT, FOURTHQ_POINT, FIFTHDQ_POINT, FIRSTQ_TOTAL_POINT, SECONDQ_TOTAL_POINT, THIRDQ_TOTAL_POINT, FOURTHQ_TOTAL_POINT, FIFTHDQ_TOTAL_POINT FROM sport.volleyball_data ORDER BY MATCH_DATE, MATCH_TIME, LEAGUE, GAME_ID, GROUND DESC;

SELECT LEAGUE, GROUND, MATCH_DATE, DAY_OF_WEEK, MATCH_TIME, A_TEAM_REST_DAY, A_TEAM, A_TEAM_SET_POINT, A_TEAM_TOTAL_POINT, B_TEAM_TOTAL_POINT, B_TEAM_SET_POINT, B_TEAM, B_TEAM_REST_DAY, HANDI_CAP, HANDI_CAP_RESULT, ODD, SET_HANDI_CAP, SET_HANDI_CAP_RESULT, POINT_LINE, POINT_LINE_RESULT, A_TEAM_FIRSTQ_POINT, B_TEAM_FIRSTQ_POINT, FIRSTQ_RESULT, FIRSTQ_HANDI_CAP, FIRSTQ_HANDI_CAP_RESULT, FIRSTQ_POINT_LINE, FIRSTQ_POINT_LINE_RESULT, A_TEAM_SECONDQ_POINT, B_TEAM_SECONDQ_POINT, SECONDQ_RESULT, SECONDQ_HANDI_CAP_RESULT, SECONDQ_POINT_LINE_RESULT, A_TEAM_THIRDQ_POINT, B_TEAM_THIRDQ_POINT, THIRDQ_RESULT, THIRDQ_HANDI_CAP_RESULT, THIRDQ_POINT_LINE_RESULT, A_TEAM_FOURTHQ_POINT, B_TEAM_FOURTHQ_POINT, FOURTHQ_RESULT, FOURTHQ_HANDI_CAP_RESULT, FOURTHQ_POINT_LINE_RESULT, A_TEAM_FIFTHQ_POINT, B_TEAM_FIFTHQ_POINT, FIFTHQ_RESULT, FIFTHQ_HANDI_CAP_RESULT, FIRST_POINT, FIRST_BLOCK, FIRST_SERVE, FIRST_5POINT, FIRST_7POINT, FIRST_10POINT, FIRSTQ_POINT, SECONDQ_POINT, THIRDQ_POINT, FOURTHQ_POINT, FIFTHDQ_POINT, FIRSTQ_TOTAL_POINT, SECONDQ_TOTAL_POINT, THIRDQ_TOTAL_POINT, FOURTHQ_TOTAL_POINT, FIFTHDQ_TOTAL_POINT FROM sport.volleyball_data ORDER BY MATCH_DATE, MATCH_TIME, LEAGUE, GAME_ID, GROUND DESC;

SELECT GAME_ID, A.A_TEAM TEAM, MATCH_DATE, MATCH_TIME, FIRSTQ_POINT, SECONDQ_POINT, THIRDQ_POINT, FOURTHQ_POINT, FIFTHDQ_POINT FROM (SELECT GAME_ID,A_TEAM,MATCH_DATE,MATCH_TIME FROM VOLLEYBALL_DATA WHERE CASE WHEN HOUR(NOW()) > 11 AND HOUR(NOW()) < 22 THEN MATCH_DATE = DATE(NOW()) WHEN HOUR(NOW()) > 23 AND HOUR(NOW()) < 24 THEN MATCH_DATE = DATE(DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 DAY)) END GROUP BY A_TEAM) A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT A_TEAM, AVG(FIRSTQ_POINT) FIRSTQ_POINT FROM VOLLEYBALL_DATA WHERE MATCH_DATE < NOW() AND FIRSTQ_POINT != 0 GROUP BY A_TEAM) B ON A.A_TEAM = B.A_TEAM LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT A_TEAM, AVG(SECONDQ_POINT) SECONDQ_POINT FROM VOLLEYBALL_DATA WHERE MATCH_DATE < NOW() AND SECONDQ_POINT != 0 GROUP BY A_TEAM) C ON A.A_TEAM = C.A_TEAM LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT A_TEAM, AVG(THIRDQ_POINT) THIRDQ_POINT FROM VOLLEYBALL_DATA WHERE MATCH_DATE < NOW() AND THIRDQ_POINT != 0 GROUP BY A_TEAM) D ON A.A_TEAM = D.A_TEAM LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT A_TEAM, AVG(FOURTHQ_POINT) FOURTHQ_POINT FROM VOLLEYBALL_DATA WHERE MATCH_DATE < NOW() AND FOURTHQ_POINT != 0 GROUP BY A_TEAM) E ON A.A_TEAM = E.A_TEAM LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT A_TEAM, AVG(FIFTHDQ_POINT) FIFTHDQ_POINT FROM VOLLEYBALL_DATA WHERE MATCH_DATE < NOW() AND FIFTHDQ_POINT != 0 GROUP BY A_TEAM) F ON A.A_TEAM = F.A_TEAM ORDER BY GAME_ID;
